name: open-drone
notes:
# Open Source Drone

### Body 

- [Garud-500](https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1940102) · Well Rounded
  - "specially developed for enthusiasts who dream to build their very first custom drone using 3D Printing."
  - Good first custom drone, few pieces
- [Foldable Remix](https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1940102) · Compact / Customizable 
  - DJI Mavrik clone, attachable extensions
  - Much more portable, more points of failure
- [Hovership 3D Fly](https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1098831) · Micro
  - Micro drone
  - good 1st/2nd build
